com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint

Class JointRope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointBase
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointRope

  • public class JointRope
extends JointBase
    Rope joint, enforces a maximum distance between two points on two bodies. It has no other effect. Warning: if you attempt to change the maximum length during the simulation you will get some non-physical behavior.
    Author:
    Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

      • Fields inherited from class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.physics2d.joint.JointBase

    • Constructor Detail

      • JointRope

        public JointRope(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyA,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyB,
                 boolean collideConnected)
        Creates a rope joint.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.

      • JointRope

        public JointRope(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                 PhysicsBody2D bodyA,
                 PhysicsBody2D bodyB,
                 boolean collideConnected)
        Creates a rope joint. Uses custom physics wrappers.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.
